data.title: Joan Gayle Huffman Hamm
data.meta_description: Joan Gayle Huffman Hamm, 67 of Richfield, NC went home to our Lord on May 17, 2014. Carolina Cremation of Salisbury, NC is honored to serve the Hamm family.
data.text:
Share

Let the family know you care by sharing this tribute.

Joan Gayle Huffman Hamm, 67, of Richfield, NC went home to our Lord on May 17, 2014. Ms. Hamm was born in Iredell County on October 7, 1946 to the late S. Lee Huffman and Violet Red Barnhardt Huffman.

Ms. Hamm is survived by a son, Mark Earnhardt and wife Judy of Salisbury; a daughter, Melissa Earnhardt Murray and husband Michael of Mebane; a sister , Shirley Huffman Turbyfill and husband Terry of Mocksville; and five grandchildren, Jonathan James, Zachary, Nathan, Jacob, and Chelsea Earnhardt.

A graveside service will be held at a later date at Glenwood Memorial Cemetery in Mooresville, NC.
